<title level="1" right="Action">[Gallop](/Actions.aspx?ID=1170) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 38</row>

</column>

---

The skeletal mount Strides twice, with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed.
name: Gallop
